• Shootings down 60% across New York

  • More than 10,000 illegal guns off the street

  • Record low crime on the New York City subway

  • $3 billion+ for public safety and law enforcement

  • Retail theft down 14% statewide

  • Helped over 1,000 homeless New Yorkers with mental illness get the care they need out of the subway system

  • Created more than 814,000 private sector jobs since August 2021

  • Increased the minimum wage and tied it to inflation

  • 70,000 new or preserved units of housing

  • Secured Micron's $100 billion investment

  • Bell-to-bell phone ban in K-12 schools

  • Free school meals for every kid in New York

  • Tripled the child tax credit

  • Put 170,000 kids in child care seats that are capped at $15 per week

  • $7.6 billion investment in childcare over four years

  • Opened Grand Central Madison

  • Advanced Second Avenue Subway and Interborough Express

  • Opened the first utility-scale wind farm

  • Delivered $1.4 billion in energy savings
